nodes.text: Cera was a female Twi'lek who was paired up with a loved one during the Ewok Festival of Love.

During 1 ABY, L-O53 tasked a spacer with finding a loved one for Cera. After searching the cities of Tyrena and Kaadara during the Festival of Love, the spacer found a companion who shared similar interests with Cera.

Cera was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. She was in the game during the Ewok Festival of Love celebration of 2011. During the event, players could pair up Cera, as well as several other NPC's, with companions who shared similar interests.
